main event: An observer watched a white, round, metallic-appearing object illuminated internally and externally, moving with erratic motions faster than known aircraft.
interesting points: The object had brighter lights than any known aircraft lights,The observer lost sight of it as it went behind trees,The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes,The observer's profession was a carpenter and aircraft mechanic, reported to Mrs. Charlotte Carter-Tune.
witness description: male, 32 years old, carpenter and aircraft mechanic, spent 8 years in the Air Force as an aircraft mechanic
